about_the_game:
*Weeeeeeeeeeeeee... splash!*

A quirky, dreamy 3D environment where you race as a rubber duck, Slowly Sliding Ducks is a social game for spectators.
You're up for a powerless competition at your favorite waterpark track. Try to beat other fierce players by helplessly watching your duck floating in the wrong direction. Slide down to cross the finishing line ahead of everyone and win a useless but incredibly cool hat to sport in your next race.

You could be the fastest slow duck of the bunch, but there's nothing you can do about it!

Slowly Sliding Ducks will be released sometime in the future. Development is going slow. Very slow.

We have set up this page and you have added the game to your wishlist. What now?

Now we do the thing we do best.

We wait and chill.
detailed_description:
Feature List

- Slides
- Water
- Friends
- Physics
- Colors
- Funny hats
- Leaderboards
- A public, multiplayer pool in the duck-town square, designed to showcase how cool your duck looks in that new flamboyant Victorian cloak!


turbolento notes

Slowly Sliding Ducks contains in-game items that can be purchased with real money. About this, we want to make things clear:

  • All cosmetics can be unlocked through gameplay. No item is exclusively obtainable through monetary purchase.

  • Microtransactions are strictly cosmetic and do not provide any gameplay advantage.

Your purchases fund our development updates and new games, and we sincerely appreciate every vote of confidence you give us with your purchases.

We love hearing from our players, so please get in touch with any feedback, positive or negative, at .

name: Slowly Sliding Ducks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Race with friends or random players in this idle, cute, and relaxing game featuring rubber ducks and waterparks. Earn points to exchange for items to dress up your duck before sliding down the track again!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
